content:
Guests of Hotel Caza can enjoy all the comforts of home and more for a $25 plus tax daily Destination Fee. Services included with Destination Fee:

  • High-speed WiFi – unlimited device connections
  • Complimentary water filling stations
  • Complimentary morning coffee in the lobby
  • Complimentary local calls and toll-free calls
  • Complimentary access to our indoor and outdoor Games and Activities
  • Complimentary use of our 24-hour fitness center
  • VIP discounts on select tours, attractions, and eateries in Fisherman’s Wharf
